title: U.S. Republican lawmakers warn Trump on tariffs
text:
U.S. Republican lawmakers warn Trump on tariffs 3:31pm EST - 01:35 
U.S. Senator Lindsey Graham on Sunday joined the ranks of Republicans warning President Donald Trump his threats to tax imports of steel, aluminum, and potentially European car makers would harm U.S. consumers and manufacturers. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. Senator Lindsey Graham on Sunday joined the ranks of Republicans warning President Donald Trump his threats to tax imports of steel, aluminum, and potentially European car makers would harm U.S. consumers and manufacturers.
